entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
